headline20: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 4 airports right now.
management45: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 4 airports right now. No engine anti-ice operations are currently flagged. Across base airports: 2 critical, 19 high, 18 medium. Key bases needing attention include London Luton (LTN/EGGW), Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR) and Iaşi (IAS/LRIA); plus 18 other bases. 18 additional base airports are at medium severity and should be monitored closely. At base airports, the dominant pattern is snow-related runway contamination risk, low cloud base and mist  — most notably around Suceava Stefan cel Mare (SCV/LRSV), David the Builder Kutaisi (KUT/UGKO) and London Luton (LTN/EGGW). Network hotspots: Suceava Stefan cel Mare (SCV/LRSV), Sandefjord Airport, Torp (TRF/ENTO), Billund (BLL/EKBI), David the Builder Kutaisi (KUT/UGKO). Primary drivers: cold‑temperature performance penalties, snow / blowing snow and low cloud base. Expected impact is reduced runway capacity with higher delay and diversion risk, especially where visibility/RVR and cloud base are very low. Since the last update, 1 airports changed status, led by Tuzla (TZL/LQTZ).
detail90: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 4 airports right now. Base airports (focus): London Luton (LTN/EGGW) — HIGH: fog; visibility down to 200 m, cloud base around 0 ft | Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR) — HIGH: fog; visibility down to 100 m, cloud base around 100 ft; forecast below approach minima at times | Iaşi (IAS/LRIA) — HIGH: mist; visibility down to 1.5 km, cloud base around 100 ft; forecast below approach minima at times | Katowice Wojciech Korfanty (KTW/EPKT) — HIGH: freezing fog; visibility down to 300 m, cloud base around 400 ft | Bucharest Henri Coandă (OTP/LROP) — HIGH: fog; visibility down to 800 m, cloud base around 100 ft | Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD) — HIGH: freezing fog; runway contamination risk; cold-temperature performance penalties and 15 others. Worst affected now: Suceava Stefan cel Mare (SCV/LRSV) — CRIT: freezing fog; snow; cold-temperature performance penalties (drivers: low-visibility procedures (reduced capacity), runway visual range (RVR) constraints, approach minima limits) | Sandefjord Airport, Torp (TRF/ENTO) — CRIT: snow; cold-temperature performance penalties; strong gusts risk (drivers: cold-temperature performance penalties, snow/blowing snow) | Billund (BLL/EKBI) — CRIT: mist; snow; runway contamination risk (drivers: runway contamination / reduced braking, cold-temperature performance penalties, low ceilings) | David the Builder Kutaisi (KUT/UGKO) — CRIT: strong gusts risk (drivers: operational constraints). Changed since last run: Tuzla (TZL/LQTZ).
